resources.string: This tab displays all your receivers grouped by rooms.\n \nThe new Control Center for your home :)

This tab shows all your scenes.
 
Using scenes you can save configurations of receivers for easy access at later time.
 
An example would be a scene called "Garden lights" which turns on the pond lighting, the path lighting and the rear house lighting. Another example is the "Cinema" scene which turns on the TV and amplifier but also turns off the ceiling light.

This tab shows all your timers.
 
With timers you can let PowerSwitch automatically perform actions for a given time and day of the week. An action can be anything from switching a single receiver or switching a hole room to activating a scene.
 
An example could be the coffee machine, that turns on every morning at 6:00 am during the work week.

In this tab you can configure actions for the alarm clock app "Sleep As Android".
 
Just like with timers you can add receiver, room and scene actions. Possible events are the ringing alarm, snoozing and disabling an active alarm.
 
An example would be turning on your bedside lamp when an alarm goes off, turning the light off again when you snooze the alarm and when you finally disable the alarm to stand up the light goes on again and the coffee machine starts to work.

In this tab you add and configure apartments.
 
Different apartments have different rooms and scenes. You can assign Gateways to each apartmens, so network signals are only sent to gateways in the correct apartment.
 
Select an apartment by tapping it, modify it by press&hold.
Create and restore backups of PowerSwitch in this tab.\n \nBackups contain the complete app state, including rooms, scenes, timers, settings etc.

In this tab you can add and configure Gateways.
 
Gateways are the connection between PowerSwitch (your smartphone) and your power plugs. If you want to be able to control your power plugs on the go simply enter a DynDNS address instead of an IP. After proper router configuration you are good to go :)
 
Add a Gateway by pressing the plus button, modify them with press&hold.

In this tab you can manage any setting of the wearable companion app.
 
Change vibration feedback, highlight the last used button, choose a different theme…
 
Note: To properly sync settings with your watch, please open the wearable companion app on your watch while changing settings. Then close and reopen the wearable app and the changes should apply.

In this tab you can add and configure geofences for specific apartments.
 
Geofences allow you to make actions based on your location. Actions can be specified for enter and exit events. Geofences in this tab are always connected with an apartment, so the location of the geofence is also used for other features of PowerSwitch (like auto switching between apartments).
 
Example: Turn off all your lights when leaving your apartment and turn them on when you come home again.
